name: JSONEncoder.DateEncodingStrategy
desc: The formatting strategies available for formatting dates when encoding a date as JSON.

items.name: case deferredToDate
items.desc: The strategy that uses formatting from the Date structure.

items.name: case iso8601
items.desc: The strategy that formats dates according to the ISO 8601 and RFC 3339 standards.

items.name: case formatted(DateFormatter)
items.desc: The strategy that defers formatting settings to a supplied date formatter.

items.name: case custom((Date, Encoder) -> Void)
items.desc: The strategy that formats custom dates by calling a user-defined function.

items.name: case millisecondsSince1970
items.desc: The strategy that encodes dates in terms of milliseconds since midnight UTC on January 1, 1970.

items.name: case secondsSince1970
items.desc: The strategy that encodes dates in terms of seconds since midnight UTC on January 1, 1970.
